Автопилот корабля инициализирован. Для п: The ship's autopilot is initialized. To fly to the next object, you need to click [Fly].
В качестве жеста доброй воли наши техник: As a gesture of goodwill, our technicians will put your ship in order.
As a gesture of goodwill, our technicians will recharge your batteries.
Захвачено пиратами. Чтобы воспользоватьс: Captured by pirates. To use the services, you need to vacate the station.
Captured by pirates. To use the services, you need to free the planet.
средняя цена товара в трюме: {0}{1}: average price of the goods in the hold: {0}{1}
Бонус: Патруль не найдет {0} ящик(ов) ко: Bonus: Patrol won't find {0} contraband box(s)
Наемник [{0}] не получил жалование и пок: The mercenary [{0}] did not receive his salary and left the ship.
Наемник [{0}] не получил жалование. Его: The mercenary [{0}] did not receive a salary. His discontent is growing.
The mercenary [{0}] has left the ship.
Наемник [{0}] завершил контракт, пожелал: The mercenary [{0}] completed the contract, wished the team success and left the ship.
Запрещенные товары не обнаружены.<br>Мож:
Prohibited goods were not found.
You can continue moving.
Команда обнаружила на орбите обломки кор: The crew found the wreckage of the ship in orbit. To my great surprise, the hull remained intact. A few spacesuits, a couple of hours of work, and now you have a more spacious ship.
The team found the wreckage of the ship in orbit. Unfortunately, the hull and all the equipment were badly damaged, there is nothing to profit from.
Закончилось топливо. Необходимо заправит: Ran out of fuel. It is necessary to refuel.
Критические повреждения корабля. Необход: Critical damage to the ship. Repairs are needed.
Ваш корабль остановлен патрулем. Проводи: Your ship has been stopped by a patrol. A scan is being carried out for contraband.
Корабль тряхнуло от удара. Это была памя: The ship shook from the impact. Was it a memorial plaque?
Блуждающая самонаводящаяся ракета попала: A wandering homing missile hit the engine.
The ship's circumnavigation revealed no problems.
Кажется нужен косметический ремонт. Крас: It seems that cosmetic repairs are needed. The paint is peeling off.
Someone has scattered their belongings. Disorder.
There was a cosmo rat in the galley.
Someone forgot to turn off the water in the shower.
В корпусе обнаружена утечка. Дыра операт: A leak has been detected in the case. The hole is promptly patched up.
Премиум магазин еще не работает. Федерац: The premium store is not working yet. The Federation is preparing an update of the rules.
Посмотри рекламу и удвой награду!: Watch the ad and double the reward!
Автопилот корабля инициализирован. Для п: The ship's autopilot is initialized. To fly, click [Select Route].
Пополни кредиты или кристаллы:: Top up your credits or crystals:
You have received the best hull.
We are working on creating new ones.
Эта карта наносит урон сразу всем картам: This card deals damage to all enemy cards at once.
При нанесении урона эта карта заражает к: When dealing damage, this card infects the enemy ship by a fraction of the attack power. The enemy ship loses health every turn.
Эта карта наносит урон скрытно и игнорир: This card deals damage covertly and ignores any talents of the attacked card.
При нанесении урона противнику эта карта: When dealing damage to an enemy, this card will heal you for attack power.
Вместе с этой картой атакуют все ваши ка: Together with this card, all your cards will attack. Additional cards do not use skills.
Автопилот инициализирован, для старта на: The autopilot is initialized, to start, click something and something else, and here is a test message
Экипаж отсутствует, корабль управляется: There is no crew, the ship is controlled automatically. To hire, visit the nearest mercenary station or any planet.
К вашему экипажу присоединился {0}: Your crew has been joined by {0}
До получения следущей карты осталось: {0: Until the next card is received: {0}
Сила атаки растет с каждым уровнем на +{: The attack power increases with each level by +{0}
Наградной: карта не может быть уничтожен: Reward: The card cannot be destroyed from hunger / thirst / oxygen starvation
Открыт новый талант: [{0}]: A new talent has been discovered: [{0}]
Запрещенные товары не обнаружены. Можно: Prohibited goods were not found. You can [Continue the flight].
Совет: Два двигателя по +10 лучше чем од: Tip: Two +10 engines are better than one by +15
Совет: Подзаряжайте щит и энергию беспла: Tip: Recharge the shield and energy for free at power stations.
Совет: Не увлекайтесь контрабандой - ран: Tip: Don't get carried away with smuggling - sooner or later they will catch you.
Tip: Repair the ship for free at the docks.
Совет: нанимайте роботов, им не требуетс: Tip: Hire robots, they don't need air, water and food.
Специалист по подчинению окруждающей сре: Specialist in the subordination of the surrounding environment. Long years of training are compensated by unlimited power over almost any planet.
Диверсифицированный дроид. В Негражданск: A diversified droid. In Non-Civil Wars, AI used these droids for artillery tasks. Now, in a peaceful era, these droids have been converted for cargo purposes.
Штурмовой дроид времен Первой Негражданс: An assault droid from the time of the First Non-Civil War. It's a great model, it doesn't break down often, but there aren't enough spare parts anymore.
Штурмовой дроид разработанный ИИ специал: An assault droid developed by AI specifically for the Second Non-Civil War. The success of this model was hindered by the imminent end of the conflict between AI and humanity.
Очень старая модель штурмового дроида. И: A very old model of an assault droid. It was used by mankind to suppress colonial riots.
Представительская модель дроида. Служат: Representative model of a droid. They serve mainly in embassies, offices and other budgetary institutions.
Охранный дроид с широкими функциональным: A security droid with extensive functionality. The developer is not known.
Кибернетический огранизм. Взял лучшее от: Cybernetic ogranizm. Took the best of both worlds: stealth from the Duan race and unpretentiousness of the droid.
Рядовой житель Доминионов Ксеносов. Боль: An ordinary inhabitant of the Xenos Dominions. Most of the scavengers were slaves until recently, but after the Last Galactic War, the Senate, the highest authority of the Dominions, gave freedom to the scavengers.
Беззвучные и бестелесные духи Мальгаба,: The silent and disembodied spirits of Malgaba, one of the planets of the Xenos Dominions. They like to pick up other creature's skeletons and wear them as an embodiment, calling the remains their shelters.
Вольный наемный работник. За кредит на к: A free employee. He will fly to the end of the world for a loan.
Выпускник Военной Академии, отличный вои: A graduate of the Military Academy, a great warrior and an incredibly noisy cabin mate.
Жадные и властные владыки занимают практ: Greedy and overbearing lords occupy almost all the leadership positions in the Xenos Dominions, despite the smallest population.
Знает что, где, как и когда можно купить: He knows what, where, how and when you can buy or sell, and at the same time not be punished for it.
The ship is repaired and refueled.
Not enough crystals. No help will arrive.
Шанс выпадения: 1% анимированный, 5% лег: Chance of falling out: 1% animated, 5% legendary, 10% epic
Вашему двигателю конец? Не беда! Есть ме: Is your engine finished? It doesn't matter! There is a mechanic. A specialist in everything that can break.
Некоторые представители человечества под: Some representatives of humanity under the influence of cosmic radiation began to possess telepathic abilities. They showed themselves well in battle.
Боец второго эшелона колонизации. На пла: A fighter of the second echelon of colonization. Is something moving unfriendly on the planet? Not for long.
Первопроходец при колонизации планет. Из: A pioneer in the colonization of planets. Studies the situation, marks points on the ground, transmits data to the Directorate.
Совершенная вычислительная модель дроидо: A perfect computational model of droids. After the victory in the First and Second Non-Civil Wars, they are mainly engaged in calculations for hyper-jumps.
Некогда бывшие людьми, операторы кибер-к: Once human, the operators of a cyber suit that allows them to fight on equal terms with droids, betrayed their race and joined AI.
У шалунов дурная слава. Быстрые, наглые,: The minx have a bad reputation. Fast, arrogant, thieving, despised even in the Xenos Dominions.
Ящеры не говорят, но делают. До Последне: Lizards don't talk, but they do. Before the Last Galactic Lizard War, you could buy a few credits.
Представитель расы Горрах. Массивные тел: A representative of the Gorrach race. Massive bodies, lack of hands, bad temper. Where else to go besides piracy?
Дуан, что в переводе на общегалактически: Duan, which translates into Galactic means Shadow, the quietest killers in the universe. It is impossible to hide from them even in space.
Полуслепые существа, извечные враги духо: Half-blind creatures, eternal enemies of the spirits of Malgaba, one of the planets of the Xenos Dominions. After the Last Galactic War, they were forced to reconcile with their neighbors.
There is no dark matter. You can't speed up.
Прибыль от продажи товаров {0}{1}: Profit from the sale of goods {0}{1}
